channel.title: ssh on blog // ~ben
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on blog // ~ben

item.title: git remotes with ssh aliases
item.description: did you know that ~/.ssh/config aliases work for git remotes?? ~/.ssh/config Host gh HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/gh_key you can now use gh:username/repo as the remote in place of git@github.
